Class VectorUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw12.trazilica.VectorUtil

  • public class VectorUtil
extends Object
    Utility class offering few methods for working with vectors which are needed in calculating similarity between the documents.
    Author:
    ilijan
